import React, { useRef, useState } from "react"; import emailjs from "@emailjs/browser"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { Helmet } from "react-helmet"; import Me from "./Me.jpeg"; export default function HireMe() { // Contact Form const navigate = useNavigate(); const form = useRef(); const [isFormSubmitted, setFormSubmitted] = useState(false); // Track form submission const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs .sendForm( "service_pwvmojf", "template_ygg6k2c", form.current, "user_qGuGQyWW4uKSaHcStVUxO" ) .then( (result) => { console.log(result.text); }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); } ); e.target.reset(); setFormSubmitted(true); // Set the form submission status to true navigate("/thank-you"); }; return ( <> Dennis Mbugua

The Best Thing For You is Me! 😊

With me you’re not going to get an off-the-shelf, run-of-the mill type of project and results. I work with you & your team to understand the direction the company is heading with steadfast readiness to offer sincere service. I have a strong pristine focus, in my pursuit in ensuring I produce marvelous and exceptional work 🚀 with a lot of love ❤️ for my clients.

Am the guy to contact when you're tired of playing small{" "}

); }
